amendment.description: Amendment sought to make available $490,000 under section 511 of the Railroad Revitalization Act Loan Guarantee program for a regional rail line in San Diego, CA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment make available $490,000 in new funding under section 511 of the Railroad Revitalization Act Loan Guarantee program for a regional rail line in San Diego.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Filner amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 238 (Roll no. 289).
